name: ITP - G1302A Culvert 33 - SH38 RS179 RP5.805 - Network Drainage
template name: ITP - G1302A Culvert 33 - SH38 RS179 RP5.805 - Network Drainage

name: Detail - Setout inlet & outlet points with inverts as required by Contractor to construct to design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey (As agreed with Engineer)
2 - Locate existing services by hand digging
Detail - Ensure all services conflicting with the line of trench has been exposed by hand digging/hudro excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Potholing
Conformance Criteria - All conflicts have been located. New services and/or conflicts to be advised to Project Engineer. As-built all services
Detail - Inspect trench profile and ensure it is correct to lines and levels to design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level is correct
Detail - Ensure trench width is sufficient to provide enough space on either side of the pipe
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - D/6 or 150mm whichever is greater on either side of the pipe
Detail - Test formation level on completion of excavation to check if undercut required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection by Designer
Conformance Criteria - Designer to inspect formation level at outfalls / inlets.
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with requirements from Specifications
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Solid wall pipe – Pea Metal < 7mm
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Bedding - Ensure correct thickness of bedding is placed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Type 3 support as per drawing
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Confirm pipes diameter, class & jointing type as shown on the drawings, and that the pipes are correct and in good condition.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Certification
Conformance Criteria - Comply with Section 3 AS/NZS2566.2
Detail - Pipe Laying -Variation between design invert level to as-laid invert level must be less than 5mm. Variation of grade of one pipe to the next shall be less than 3mm
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level to follow existing pipe
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Inspect pipes prior to backfilling to ensure they have been installed correctly and the joints are in place. Check for gaps and/or defects and check pipe alignment for straightness
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - No defects/ gaps / pipes are aligned correctly
Detail - As-built survey of pipes installed
Frequency - Once line is completed between 2 structures
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Invert level <= 5mm and grade <= 3mm from design levels
Detail - Inspection of pipes prior to backfilling to ensure they have been installed correctly and that the joints are sealed. Check for any gaps.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with the Specification
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Comply with grading specification 100% pass 50mm at least 45% pass the 19mm sieve, and not more than 10% pass 425 micron sieve, CBR not less than 40 and SE of not less than 40
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Comply with grading specification 100% pass 50mm at least 45% pass the 19mm sieve, and not more than 10% pass 425 micron sieve, CBR not less than 40 and SE of not less than 40

Detail - Backfill 150mm lifts with (material) and test every 300mm lift to underside of Subgrade alternatively, to 300mm above crown of pipe in berms. Remainder of backfill to be done with excavated material.
Frequency - 1 test per 20 m length of trench per 300mm lift
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Testing
Conformance Criteria - 97% (under carriageway) or 95% (under berm) of MDD or Clegg equivalent
Detail - Structures to be installed to the design survey location and level
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Records - CS-4006 Manhole Catchpit Board Check Sheet and Survey receipt
Detail - Arrange as-built survey of the structure and all invert levels
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Detail - Ensure all NCRs are closed and included within QA file, Delivery Dockets and Lab Testing Spreadsheet and Test Reports to be included in QA File

Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
Records - Delivery Dockets, Test Reports, Lab Testing Register
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
